verbs.description: WASHINGTON ( AP ) — [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-TMP: on Friday] [V: signed] [ARG1: a trio of executive orders to overhaul the federal bureaucracy by making it easier to fire federal workers for poor perfo]
